description: THUNDERCROSS GORE-TEX is a waterproof trail shoe for a dynamic, cushioned ride with superior grip and foothold. Equipped with aggressive 5mm lugs to tackle any terrain, no matter how tricky, technical, or just downright nasty. Developed in the French Alps, tried and tested on everything from rolling terrain to rocky slopes or sticky single tracks.
name: Salomon Thundercross GTX - Mens
